verbose_text: Total fatty acids were extracted using a modified Morisson and Smith procedure as previously described [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], allowing for direct one-step transesterification of total fatty acids in tissue homogenates : An aliquot of each tissue homogenate was subjected to fatty acid methylation with 500 muL n-hexane (Carl Roth, Karlsruhe, Germany), 500 muL 12% boron trifluoride-methanol solution (Sigma-Aldrich, Steinheim, Germany) and 50 muL pentadecanoic acid (1 mg/mL; Sigma-Aldrich) as internal standard and incubated for 60 min at 100 degreesC.
